document_data.mainbody:
Menchuk was a seller of dry goods in the town of Ghars in Cormyr in the midâ€“14 century DR.
When the Merchants Guild members and their retinues arrived in Ghars on Eleint 19 in the , Menchuk was so eager to ingratiate himself that he swiftly shoveled away the horse dung left by one so it would offend the next.
